entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
